inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend Status = case(
    ResultType == "0", 'Successful',
    'Failed'
)
| summarize count() by Status , bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend Status = case(
    ResultType == "0", 'Successful',
    'Failed'
)
| summarize count() by Status , bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs|summarize signInCount = count() by AppDisplayName|sort by signInCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs |extend OS= DeviceDetail.operatingSystem  |extend Browser =extract("([a-zA-Z]+)",1,tostring(DeviceDetail.browser))  | where OS!="" | where Browser !="" | where AppDisplayName !=""  |summarize count() by tostring(OS)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs | where AppDisplayName !="" |summarize signInCount = count() by Location

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs|summarize signInCount = count() by AppDisplayName|sort by signInCount desc

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs |extend OS= DeviceDetail.operatingSystem  |extend Browser =extract("([a-zA-Z]+)",1,tostring(DeviceDetail.browser))  | where OS!="" | where Browser !="" | where AppDisplayName !=""  |summarize count() by tostring(OS)

content.Query: SigninLogs |extend OS= DeviceDetail.operatingSystem  |extend Browser =extract("([a-zA-Z]+)",1,tostring(DeviceDetail.browser))  | where OS!="" | where Browser !="" | where AppDisplayName !=""  |summarize amount= count() by tostring(OS), tostring(Browser)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs | where AppDisplayName !=""  |summarize signInCount = count() by Location, AppDisplayName
| order by signInCount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend AppDisplayName = iff(AppDisplayName == '', 'Unknown', AppDisplayName)
| where AppDisplayName in ('*') or '*' in ('*')
| extend ConditionalAccess = case(ConditionalAccessStatus ==0,"Success",ConditionalAccessStatus == 1, "Failure", ConditionalAccessStatus == 2, "Not Applied", ConditionalAccessStatus == "", "Not Applied", "Unknown")
| summarize Count = count() by ConditionalAccess

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs| summarize count() by tostring( DeviceDetail.trustType)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs| summarize count() by tostring( DeviceDetail.trustType)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs | extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode | extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason | where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012") | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 24h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012")
| summarize amount = count() by tostring(ErrorCode), bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012")
| summarize amount = count() by IPAddress

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012")
| summarize amount = count() by Location

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
SigninLogs
| extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012")
| summarize amount = count() by UserPrincipalName

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value: SigninLogs | extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode | extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason | where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012") | summarize count() by AppDisplayName, tostring(ErrorCode)| sort by count_

content.Query:
SigninLogs
| extend ErrorCode = Status.errorCode
| extend FailureReason = Status.failureReason
| where ErrorCode !in ("0","5048","50140", "51006", "50059", "65001", "52004", "50055", "50144","50072", "50074", "16000","16001", "16003", "50127", "50125", "50129","50143", "81010", "81014", "81012")
| summarize amount = count() by AppDisplayName, tostring(FailureReason), tostring(ErrorCode), UserPrincipalName, IPAddress
| sort by amount
